item.description:
Come down to Murphy's Taproom on January 5th to watch the St. Anselm's ABC/WMUR Debate. Barry Goldwater, Jr., and Rand Paul will be there!!!

We can do outreach at the Verizon for the Monarchs Game for 6:00 - 6:45 then come into Murphys to watch the debate.

See you there!


The 90-minute debates, will be hosted by ABC, WMUR and Facebook, are set to take place at 7:00pm on the campus Manchester's Saint Anselm College.
item.name: Debate Watching Party with Rand Paul and Barry Goldwater, Jr.
